entry.dcterms:description: regional inequalities in qualification and cultural conditions; property and income mobility and its regional inequalities
entry.dcterms:subject: social stratification and groupings
cultural activities and participation
education, school
income, property and savings
equality and inequality
social and occupational mobility
health condition
society and culture
administrative area
aggregate data
cross-section

Joint analysis of the data from the sample of Stratification-Model Study (A87) and the Hungarian Central Statistical Office (KSH) settlement statistical survey (census data of all Hungarian settlements and T-STAR).
Secondary analysis of summarized census and statistical data.
A
